Title: Piece of Sh*t
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Lauren Morelli, Jordan Harrison (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Piper's plan to edge out the competition could backfire badly. Cindy finds a way to make Taystee's job pay off. Luschek gets some interesting mail.
